@NonNullApi

Package org.springframework.data.tarantool.core.convert

Tarantool-specific converter infrastructure for Spring Data

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TarantoolConverter
    Basic Tarantool entity-to-tuple converter interface
    TarantoolReader<T>
    Responsible for converting Tarantool tuples into the Java entities
    TarantoolWriter<T>
    Responsible for converting Java entities into the native TarantoolTuple or Map
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTarantoolConverter
    Base class for TarantoolConverter implementations.
    DateConverters  
    MappingTarantoolConverter
    A mapping converter for Tarantool.
    MappingTarantoolReadConverter
    Mapping converter for Tarantool for reading objects from tuples
    MappingTarantoolWriteConverter
    Mapping converter for Tarantool for writing objects to tuples
    TarantoolCustomConversions
    Implementation of Tarantool-specific custom conversions
    TarantoolJsr310Converters
    JSR-310 specific Converter implementations for converting date and time.
    TarantoolMapTypeAliasAccessor
    Actually reads and writes type alias into a nested object in tuple
    TarantoolMapTypeMapper
    Value type mapper for nested objects based on the special "class" field value
    TarantoolTupleTypeAliasAccessor
    Reads and writes type alias into a tuple
    TarantoolTupleTypeMapper
    Tarantool tuple value type mapper based on the special "class" field value
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DateConverters.CalendarToLongConverter  
    DateConverters.DateToLongConverter  
    DateConverters.DateToStringConverter  
    DateConverters.NumberToCalendarConverter  
    DateConverters.SerializedObjectToDateConverter  
    TarantoolJsr310Converters.DurationToStringConverter  
    TarantoolJsr310Converters.InstantToLongConverter  
    TarantoolJsr310Converters.LocalDateTimeToLongConverter  
    TarantoolJsr310Converters.LocalDateToLongConverter  
    TarantoolJsr310Converters.LocalTimeToLongConverter  
    TarantoolJsr310Converters.NumberToInstantConverter  
    TarantoolJsr310Converters.NumberToLocalDateConverter  
    TarantoolJsr310Converters.NumberToLocalDateTimeConverter  
    TarantoolJsr310Converters.NumberToLocalTimeConverter  
    TarantoolJsr310Converters.PeriodToStringConverter  
    TarantoolJsr310Converters.StringToDurationConverter  
    TarantoolJsr310Converters.StringToPeriodConverter  
    TarantoolJsr310Converters.StringToZoneIdConverter  
    TarantoolJsr310Converters.ZoneIdToStringConverter
